comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: This dinner took place on 24 April, 1939 and was addressed by the Minister for External Affairs, William Hughes. Hughes is the man at right in the pair standing at the head table. The Sydney Morning Herald's report of the dinner is poignant: nla.gov.au/nla.news-article17592394
